title: I for One Welcome Myself as Overlord
body:
Just wanted to let everyone know that Andreas has promoted me to being a moderator of this subreddit!

It's very exciting and in the coming days I'll be updating the sidebar and making sure that newcomers and the standard folks alike will get the most possible out of this subreddit.

Thanks! :)
